category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EPM_valid_roles_to_assign_responsible_party
preference.preference_description: Determines the list of privileged users allowed to reassign the Responsible Party responsibility of a task. Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be one of the following values: responsible_party - Allows the current Responsible Party. active_surrogate - Allows the current surrogate user. task_owner - Allows the owning user of the workflow process. task_owning_group - Allows all users belonging to the group of the owning user. world - Allows all users. privileged - Allows the following users: Current task owner, Responsible Party, All Administrative users group::role - Allows members of a specific group and role. Accepts following format: group::role where group is valid group name and role is a valid role name. This preference will be deprecated from 10.1.2.2 and the assign action will be performed on bmide condition 'Fnd0AssignAccessPrivilege' evaluation.
